data.title: ATA announces new publisher for "Arizona Trucking" Magazine
data.meta_description: We are pleased to announce that the Arizona Trucking Association has partnered with Matthews Publishing Group (MPG) to publish our beautiful statewide magazine
data.text:
We are pleased to announce that the Arizona Trucking Association has partnered with Matthews Publishing Group (MPG) to publish our beautiful statewide magazine and buyers’ guide, Arizona Trucking.

Arizona Trucking will continue to provide great advertising opportunities for any of our members who want to market their corporate message to our members and readers. MPG will bring terrific original editorial content written exclusively for ATA members, with first-class graphic design, photography and production, plus widespread distribution.

Best of all, these improvements are being made while the advertising rates for the publication have been lowered. So, you will get more for less, and everybody loves the sound of that!

MPG has been improving the trucking industry’s image with its unique, award-winning style of publishing state trucking association magazines for 24 years, and they bring a terrific team of talented professionals to work on each publishing project.

Jennifer Matthews-Drake from MPG will be contacting you in the coming days and weeks. If you are interested in advertising, she will take care of everything you need and make the process go smoothly. You may reach out to her directly at jennifer@matthewspublishing.com or (501) 690-9393.

Members may also contact me to indicate interest in advertising and to share potential story ideas.

We look forward to a great partnership with MPG!

Sincerely,

Tony Bradley

President & CEO

Arizona Trucking Association
